column4: How do you setup the security McAfee that I am registered with through my broadband service, Windstream?
Does anyone know how to setup the security McAfee that I am registered with through my broadband service, Windstream?
on ubuntu?
I don't believe you can use that on linux and you wouldn't need to either
yes
an antivirus isn't needed, and a firewall is provided by default
do you have a router?
the router should provide a firewall
I said that
it's ubuntu, not unbuntu
please don't shout "help".  It depends on what you downloaded
particularly what format it is
Anything, just as if your on WIndows with firefox.
it still depends on the file format and what it is
*.exe
ubuntu doesn't use .exe natively
you have to use wine if you want to run .exe files in ubuntu
tar xzf file.tar.gz
isn't pulseaudio installed by default?
you may need to check the mixer settings
have you tried https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SoundTroubleshooting ?
try changing all of them (except the last dropbox) to PulseAudio Sound Server
